SummaryEnglish: In AD 2045, a group of military cadets, attending the preparatory course of the Central Military Academy, proceeded for training aboard the space station Aries. Within this group of cadets were Ryota Aizawa and his classmates including Sayaka Nagase and Kazuhiko Nitta. The situation went sour when a terrorist group called "Parallax" took over the station. While the military successfully evacuated the station, Ryota and his group were trapped aboard. Worse still, the boarding assault left most of the military forces dead, effectively leaving the cadets on their own. An unexpected twist occurs when a mysterious virus was released within the station, gaining control of almost all personnel and turning them into mindless creatures in the process. This forced everyone, friend and foe alike, to find a way out of the station alive.

1.SummaryEnglish: Part 1 of a recap episode of episodes 1-10 told from the perspective of Cellaria.

2.SummaryEnglish: Part 2 of a recap episode of episodes 1-10 told from the perspective of Nanami.

3.TitleEnglish: Meeting of the Two - Sayaka X Ryouta

1.SummaryEnglish: Arrival of the military students and passengers on Aries Station. Commencement of their training.

2.SummaryEnglish: Shuhei, Aki and Aya arrive. Ryota buys time for Sayaka during a training simulation for her to find Aya and tell that she will not be able to see each other.

3.SummaryEnglish: Warning klaxons signal an emergency. Terrorists begin their attack while the crew and passengers attempt to evacuate.

4.SummaryEnglish: Some are stranded on the station. Shuhei and Cellaria are injured in battle. Flashback to Nao's childhood.

5.SummaryEnglish: Flashback to Aki's childhood. The military students prepare for a counter-assault on the terrorists.

6.SummaryEnglish: Cellaria is captured. Shuhei attempts a rescue.

7.SummaryEnglish: Discovery of a strange virus. Cooperation occurs all over the station for survival. Nao is injured in an attack.

8.SummaryEnglish: Nanami is found. The terrorists are double-crossed. Flashback to Yu's childhood.

9.SummaryEnglish: Shuhei is being corrupted. Yu is captured but escapes with the help of her childhood friend.

10.SummaryEnglish: Cellaris's past is revealed. The military students make plans to leave the station.

11.SummaryEnglish: Aya manages to escape at the cost of Gale's life who ensures her safety.

12.SummaryEnglish: With the station starting to burn up in the atmosphere of Earth, the rest of the crew commenced the evacuation of the station. The event shifted forward for 1 year, where everyone returned to their normal lives. Most characters' futures were revealed as well.
